verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, When either man <S%H376><s%> or woman <S%H802><s%> shall separate <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8686><s%> themselves to vow <S%H5087><s%> <S%H8800><s%> a vow <S%H5088><s%> of a Nazarite <S%H5139><s%>, to separate <S%H5144><s%> <S%H8687><s%> themselves unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>:

He shall separate <S%H5144><s%> <S%H8686><s%> himself from wine <S%H3196><s%> and strong drink <S%H7941><s%>, and shall drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no vinegar <S%H2558><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%>, or vinegar <S%H2558><s%> of strong drink <S%H7941><s%>, neither shall he drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any liquor <S%H4952><s%> of grapes <S%H6025><s%>, nor eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> moist <S%H3892><s%> grapes <S%H6025><s%>, or dried <S%H3002><s%>.

All the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> shall he eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> nothing that is made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of the vine <S%H3196><s%> tree <S%H1612><s%>, from the kernels <S%H2785><s%> even to the husk <S%H2085><s%>.

All the days <S%H3117><s%> of the vow <S%H5088><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> there shall no razor <S%H8593><s%> come <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon his head <S%H7218><s%>: until the days <S%H3117><s%> be fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, in the which he separateth <S%H5144><s%> <S%H8686><s%> himself unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, he shall be holy <S%H6918><s%>, and shall let the locks <S%H6545><s%> of the hair <S%H8181><s%> of his head <S%H7218><s%> grow <S%H1431><s%> <S%H8763><s%>.

All the days <S%H3117><s%> that he separateth <S%H5144><s%> <S%H8687><s%> himself unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> he shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at no dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> body <S%H5315><s%>.

He shall not make himself unclean <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8691><s%> for his father <S%H1><s%>, or for his mother <S%H517><s%>, for his brother <S%H251><s%>, or for his sister <S%H269><s%>, when they die <S%H4194><s%>: because the consecration <S%H5145><s%> of his 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> is upon his head <S%H7218><s%>.
All the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> he is holy <S%H6918><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And if any man <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> very <S%H6621><s%> suddenly <S%H6597><s%> by him, and he hath defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of his consecration <S%H5145><s%>; then he shall shave <S%H1548><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his cleansing <S%H2893><s%>, on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall he shave <S%H1548><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it.

And on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> he shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> turtles <S%H8449><s%>, or two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> pigeons <S%H3123><s%>, to the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>:

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the one <S%H259><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and the other <S%H259><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> <S%H8765><s%> for him, for that <S%H834><s%> he sinned <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> by the dead <S%H5315><s%>, and shall hallow <S%H6942><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his head <S%H7218><s%> that same day <S%H3117><s%>.

And he shall consecrate <S%H5144><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%>, and shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> for a trespass offering <S%H817><s%>: but the days <S%H3117><s%> that were before <S%H7223><s%> shall be lost <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, because his separation <S%H5145><s%> was defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And this is the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of the Nazarite <S%H5139><s%>, when <S%H3117><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: he shall be brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>:

And he shall offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> his offering <S%H7133><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> he lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> for a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> ewe lamb <S%H3535><s%> of the first <S%H1323><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> for a sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> without blemish <S%H8549><s%> for peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>,

And a basket <S%H5536><s%> of matzah <S%H4682><s%>, cakes <S%H2471><s%> of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and wafers <S%H7550><s%> of matzah <S%H4682><s%> anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%>, and their meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, and their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall bring <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and shall offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his sin offering <S%H2403><s%>, and his burnt offering <S%H5930><s%>:

And he shall offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ram <S%H352><s%> for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace offerings <S%H8002><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, with the basket <S%H5536><s%> of matzah <S%H4682><s%>: the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall offer <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> also his meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, and his drink offering <S%H5262><s%>.

And the Nazarite <S%H5139><s%> shall shave <S%H1548><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the head <S%H7218><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, and shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the hair <S%H8181><s%> of the head <S%H7218><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it in the fire <S%H784><s%> which is under the sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of the peace offerings <S%H8002><s%>.

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the sodden <S%H1311><s%> shoulder <S%H2220><s%> of the ram <S%H352><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> cake <S%H2471><s%> out of the basket <S%H5536><s%>, and one <S%H259><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> wafer <S%H7550><s%>, and shall put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them upon the hands <S%H3709><s%> of the Nazarite <S%H5139><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> the hair of his separation <S%H5145><s%> is shaven <S%H1548><s%> <S%H8692><s%>:

And the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> shall wave <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them for a wave offering <S%H8573><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: this is holy <S%H6944><s%> for the Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, with the wave <S%H8573><s%> breast <S%H2373><s%> and heave <S%H8641><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%>: and after <S%H310><s%> that the Nazarite <S%H5139><s%> may drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%>.

This is the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of the Nazarite <S%H5139><s%> who hath vowed <S%H5087><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and of his offering <S%H7133><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> for his separation <S%H5145><s%>, beside that that his hand <S%H3027><s%> shall get <S%H5381><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: according <S%H6310><s%> to the vow <S%H5088><s%> which he vowed <S%H5087><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, so he must do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of his separation <S%H5145><s%>.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto Aharon <S%H175><s%> and unto his sons <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, On this wise <S%H3541><s%> ye shall bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto them,
The YY <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee, and keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee:
The YY <S%H3068><s%> make his face <S%H6440><s%> shine <S%H215><s%> <S%H8686><s%> upon thee, and be gracious <S%H2603><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee:
The YY <S%H3068><s%> lift up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his countenance <S%H6440><s%> upon thee, and give <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee peace <S%H7965><s%>.
And they shall put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> upon the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>; and I will bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them.
